document.docAuthor: Caterino, Michael S. & Ferro, Michael L.
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Rove Beetles (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) of South Carolina, Based on Published Records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Rove Beetles (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) of South Carolina, Based on Published Records

subSubSection.paragraph:
- Reported in Kirk (1969 , 1970 ) as
Staphylinus maxillosus
.

Platydracus cinnamopterus (Gravenhorst)
; Kirk 1969 , 1970 ;
Brunke et al. 2011
.

- Reported in Kirk (1969 , 1970 ) as
Staphylinus cinnamopterus
.

- Reported in Kirk (1969) as
Staphylinus comes .

- Reported in Kirk (1970) as
Staphylinus exulans
.

Platydracus femoratus (Fabricius)
; Kirk 1970 . - Reported in Kirk (1970) as
Staphylinus femoratus
.

- Reported in Kirk (1969 , 1970 ) as
Staphylinus fossator
.

- Reported in Kirk (1970) as
Staphylinus vulpinus
.

- Reported in Kirk (1970) as
Staphylinus maculosus
.

- Reported in Kirk (1970) as
Staphylinus pinorum
.

Platydracus praetermissus Newton
;
Brunke et al. 2011
.

- Reported in Kirk (1969 , 1970 ) as
Staphylinus tomentosus .

- Reported in Kirk (1969) as
Staphylinus violaceous
.

- Reported in Kirk (1969) as
Quedius molochinus (Gravenhorst)
.
Quedius laticollis
was reported by Smetana (1971) as
Quedius neomolochinus Korge
because he indicated that most New World records of the European
Q. molochinus
were in error. However, Smetana (1973) subsequently synonymized
Q. neomolochinus
with
Q. laticollis
, whose identity had previously been uncertain.

- Reported in Kirk (1969) as
Acholerops retusa
[sic].

Chevrolatia amoena LeConte
; Kirk 1969 ; O’ Keefe 1997 .
- Kirk’ s (1969) identification of this species was uncertain.
- Kirk’ s (1969) identification of this species was uncertain.

Euconnus dentiger ? (Casey)
; Kirk 1969 , 1970 . - Kirk’ s (1969, 1970) identification of this species was uncertain.
- Kirk’ s (1970) identification of this species was uncertain.
- Kirk’ s (1970) identification of this species was uncertain.
- Kirk’ s (1969) identification of this species was uncertain.

- Kirk (1969) reported this (uncertainly) as
Napochus schaumi Casey
, a homonym now replaced by
E . magister
.
Napochus Thomson
is now treated as a subgenus of
Euconnus Thomson.
- Kirk’ s (1969) identification of this species was uncertain.
- Kirk’ s (1969) identification of this species was uncertain.
- Kirk’ s (1969, 1970) identification of this species was uncertain.

Microscydmus misellus (LeConte)
; Kirk 1969 . - Reported as
Euconnus misellus
in Kirk (1969) .
